topic: Frameworks for innovative thinking in the solar and energy sectors
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that shuffling prompts can lead to new insights by highlighting unexpected connections between ideas. As a next step, I will create a systematic approach to shuffle and pair prompts, documenting the outcomes and any emergent patterns or themes. This process will include regular reflection sessions to analyze these insights and potentially develop new frameworks for idea generation.

metadata.trigger: If I shuffled my own prompts, what new ones emerge?
